original_text: Arabia, and all the princes of Kedar, they occupied with thee in lambs, and rams, and goats: in these were they thy merchants.
korean_text: 아라비아와 게달의 모든 고관은 네 손아래 상인이 되어 어린 양과 숫양과 염소들, 그것으로 너와 거래하였도다

sentences.original_text: Arabia, and all the princes of Kedar,
they occupied with thee in lambs,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너와 함께 어린 양으로 거래하였고,

sentences.original_text: in these were they thy merchants.
